activity_roleplay_silent: Pardon? I didn't quite hear you.
activity_roleplay_timeout: Time Ran out... try a little quicker.
activity_roleplay_you_learned_X_new_phra: You learned %u new phrases. They've been added to your phrasebook to use them in the real world.
alert_are_you_sure_you_want_to_quit: Are you sure you want to quit?
alert_are_you_sure_you_want_to_leave:
Are you sure you want to leave? your progress will be lost!
*Complete your info* to save it.
alert_do_you_want_to_save_if_you_complet: Do you want to save your progress first? You can if you *complete your info*.
alert_its_awesome_you_need_to_complete_y:
It's awesome you want to reference these later in the real world.
For that you need to *complete your info*
error_microphone_message: You have denied use of the microphone. To use, you need to change it in device *Settings - LeadGen*
city_select_top_label: What city do you live in?

level_select.level_example: "I'm an engineer. I work in a big company. I live in Asia."
"I worked in the UK for five years. I'm planning to move to China next year."
"I'd like to make a reservation to fly to Los Angeles on the 5th. I'll be returning on October 15th."
"Before going back for my MBA, I had been working in an internet company for five years."
"In my opinion, homelessness is the most critical issue facing society. We have to develop effective policies for reintegrating homeless people into mainstream society."

level_select_title: Select the sentences that you can understand to determine your English level
phone_select_subtitle_1: A code will be sent to you in order to verify your phone number
phone_select_subtitle_2: Your code is on its way...
phone_select_subtitle_4: Oh no! it seems the code is wrong
purpose_select_title: Are you more interested in Business or Travel topics?

purpose_selections.text: English is the key to advance my career.
I need English for my career, but I also want to travel abroad.
English will help me travel abroad, but it is also useful for my career.
I want to travel around the world!

splash_detail: An interactive and exciting way to learn, practice and discover English anytime and anywhere. With rich and interesting lessons and content, learning English has never been more exciting.
splash_learn_native_english: Learn the native English with real life topics in the app.
ef_center_help_hint: Search above for your city or choose use my location for the best results.
ef_center_no_center_detail:
It appears there are no EF centers near you. But you can still amp up your English game with English Live.
Learn online with expert teachers, 24/7.
